text:
@SethAbramson "It is hard to process that nearly 4,000 Americans died of COVID-19 in just the last 48 hours... while Trump was tweeting about his TV ratings."

That narcissistic sociopath would continue to tweet about his ratings even after 4,000,000 Americans died of COVID-19
